title: WEDNESDAY 4/28 - DRAFT EVE
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY 4/28 - DRAFT EVE
description:
We're just one day away from the 2021 NFL Draft and many think Florida Tight end could be the first non-QB off the board. Hear how he thinks the draft will shake out (0:14). The Bears could be in the market for a QB. GM Ryan Pace (1:20) talks about adding a rookie to the QB room. Wide receiver DeVonta Smith (2:11) talks about why he feels he's the top WR in the draft...and Baker Mayfield(3:00) goes X-Files on us!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
